meanings.sent1: The tautest rope held the swing securely in place.
meanings.sent2: The drum skin was tautest when the musician tuned it carefully.
meanings.sent3: The tautest elastic band in the world snapped comically during the magic show.
meanings.sent4: Her nerves were tautest as she waited for the exam results, like a bowstring ready to release an arrow.
meanings.sent5: The tautest sail on the boat billowed in the wind, propelling it forward swiftly.

meanings.definition: Showing no signs of slackness or looseness
meanings.sent1: The tautest fabric of the dress accentuated her figure elegantly.
meanings.sent2: His tautest expression revealed no hint of emotion.
meanings.sent3: The tautest lid on the jar refused to budge, causing a humorous struggle in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The tautest security measures were in place to protect the valuable artifacts in the museum.
meanings.sent5: The tautest grip on the steering wheel kept the car steady on the icy road.
